title: Hunan Province provides Covid supplies to the Timor-Leste Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries in June 2020
description: On June 29, 2020, the Chinese Ambassador to Timor-Leste, Xiao Jianguo, handed over masks and forehead thermometers to the Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries of East Timor. These materials will be used to combat the COVID-19 pandemic. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.  The Deputy Minister of East Agriculture and Fisheries, a representative of the United Nations Food Programme in East Asia, Liu Dayeng, Secretary General of the Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries, and the Economic and Commercial Counselor of the Embassy, Geng Xiewei, attended the handover ceremony.
combined_text:
# Sector
HEALTH

# Title
Hunan Province provides Covid supplies to the Timor-Leste Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries in June 2020

# Description
On June 29, 2020, the Chinese Ambassador to Timor-Leste, Xiao Jianguo, handed over masks and forehead thermometers to the Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries of East Timor. These materials will be used to combat the COVID-19 pandemic. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.  The Deputy Minister of East Agriculture and Fisheries, a representative of the United Nations Food Programme in East Asia, Liu Dayeng, Secretary General of the Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries, and the Economic and Commercial Counselor of the Embassy, Geng Xiewei, attended the handover ceremony.
justification: Project involves donation of medical supplies for pandemic response, unrelated to energy or environmental impacts
evidence: Handover of masks and forehead thermometers for COVID-19 response, categorized under health sector

title: Chinese Embassy provides 30,000 masks to the Timorese National Police in June 2020
description: On June 26, 2020, the Chinese Embassy in Timor-Leste donated 30,000 medical masks to the Timorese National Police. The masks will be used to help the police in East Timor prevent and control COVID-19. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.  A handover ceremony took place for this donation at the Chinese Embassy in Timor-Leste. Ambassador Xiao Jianguo of China, the East Timor National Police Commander Faustino, and other senior police officers attended the ceremony.
staff_comments: AidData has estimated the transaction amount for this donation based on price catalogues from the World Health Organization (WHO). Please see the TUFF Methodology for additional details.

title: Chinese Ministry of National Defense donates Covid supplies to the Ministry of National Defense of Timor-Leste in June 2020
description: On June 25, 2020, the Chinese Embassy in Timor-Leste handed over Covid materials provided by the Chinese Ministry of National Defense to the East Timor Defense Ministry and the National Defense Forces. The materials will be used to help the Eastern Timor Defense Forces better combat the epidemic. The specific amounts and monetary value of this donation are unknown.  The handover ceremony was held at the East Timor Defense Force Headquarters.  Ambassador Xiao Jianguo, East Timor Minister of Defense, Commander of the National Defense Forces, and Defense Attaché to East Timor, Senior Colonel Huang Damin, attended the ceremony.

title: Chinese Embassy awards 'Chinese Ambassador Scholarship' to 50 Timorese students in 2020
description: On January 21, 2020, Xiao Jianguo, the Chinese Ambassador to Timor-Leste, awarded the Chinese Ambassador Scholarship to 50 students at the Universidade Nacional Timor Lorosa’e (UNTL). This scholarship is designed to help intelligent and poor students complete their studies. The monetary value of each scholarship is unknown.  The award ceremony for these scholarships was held at the Universidade Nacional Timor Lorosa'e. Members of the Ministry of Higher Education, Science and Culture and university teachers attended the award ceremony.
combined_text:

title: Chinese Embassy provides anti-epidemic supplies to Timor-Leste in March 2020
description: On March 4, 2020, Ambassador Dr. Xiao Jianguo donated a batch of anti-epidemic supplies to Timor-Leste. The donated supplies included 1 thermal imaging camera, 6 hand thermometers and 3,000 face masks. They will be used to help the Timorese government prevent and control the epidemic. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.  A handover ceremony was held for the donation. Jorge Camoes, the Timorese Secretary-General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and other officials from the Timorese Ministry of Health were in attendance.
staff_comments: AidData has estimated the transaction amount for this donation based on price catalogues from the World Health Organization (WHO). Please see the TUFF Methodology for additional details.
combined_text:
# Sector
HEALTH

# Title
Chinese Embassy provides anti-epidemic supplies to Timor-Leste in March 2020

# Description
On March 4, 2020, Ambassador Dr. Xiao Jianguo donated a batch of anti-epidemic supplies to Timor-Leste. The donated supplies included 1 thermal imaging camera, 6 hand thermometers and 3,000 face masks. They will be used to help the Timorese government prevent and control the epidemic. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.  A handover ceremony was held for the donation. Jorge Camoes, the Timorese Secretary-General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and other officials from the Timorese Ministry of Health were in attendance.
justification: Project involves donation of medical supplies for epidemic prevention, with no direct environmental or energy transition impact
evidence: Anti-epidemic supplies including thermal imaging cameras, hand thermometers, and face masks; healthcare sector focus

title: Chinese government provides Covid supplies to Timor-Leste in April 2020
description: On April 28, 2020, the Chinese Embassy delivered a batch of medical supplies to the Government of Timor-Leste. The donated supplies included 42,000 masks, 40,000 KN95 masks, 4,400 protective suits, 4,440 visors, 4,400 shoe covers, 5,000 medical gloves, 80 thermometers and 90 portable ventilators. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.  A handover ceremony was held for the donation at the Presidente Nicolau Lobato International Airport. The Timorese Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation and China’s Ambassador in Timor-Leste attended the ceremony.
staff_comments: AidData has estimated the transaction amount for this donation based on price catalogues from the World Health Organization (WHO). Please see the TUFF Methodology for additional details.

title: Chinese government provides anti-epidemic materials to Togo in June 2020
description: On June 26, 2020, the Chinese government provided anti-epidemic materials to the Ministry of Health in Togo. These materials will be used for COVID-19 response and prevention efforts in Togo. The specific material type, amount and monetary value of this donation is unknown. However, the producer of the materials appears to be Yantai Show Long Medical Technology Co., Ltd, a company owned by Shandong Shulang Garment, that produces gloves, masks, and full-body PPE.  A handover ceremony was held for this donation. Chao Weidong, the Chinese Ambassador to Togo, and the Minister of Health and Public Health of Togo attended the ceremony and signed the handover certificate.
combined_text:

title: Chinese government provides agricultural aid materials to Togo in July 2020
description: On July 28, 2020, the Chinese government provided agricultural aid materials to the Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock and Fisheries of Togo. These materials will be used to promote agricultural development, accelerate the implementation of the national development plan, increase food production, and ensure food security in Togo. The specific content and monetary value of this donation is unknown.  A handover ceremony was held for this donation. China’s Ambassador to Togo, Chao Weidongm, and Togolese Minister of Agriculture, Livestock and Fisheries, Coutla Bataka, attended the ceremony and signed the handover certificate.   This donation of agricultural materials is part of the seventh phase of China's technical assistance to Togo as part of the "Eight Major Actions" of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum Beijing Summit. This project promotes agricultural cooperation between China and Togo. Details of this seventh phase of assistance are outlined in Project ID#87089.
combined_text:
# Sector

On July 28, 2020, the Chinese government provided agricultural aid materials to the Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock and Fisheries of Togo. China’s Ambassador to Togo, Chao Weidongm, and Togolese Minister of Agriculture, Livestock and Fisheries, Coutla Bataka, attended the ceremony and signed the handover certificate.   This donation of agricultural materials is part of the seventh phase of China's technical assistance to Togo as part of the "Eight Major Actions" of the China-Africa Cooperation Forum Beijing Summit. This project promotes agricultural cooperation between China and Togo. Details of this seventh phase of assistance are outlined in Project ID#87089.

title: Chinese Embassy provides materials to SOS Children's Villages in Togo to help disadvantaged children
description: On September 10, 2020, the Chinese embassy provided materials to the SOS Children’s Village in Togo. These materials will be distributed to disadvantaged children in Togo. It is possible that this donation will be used for COVID-19 response aid as it is mentioned that the disadvantaged children were negatively impacted by the pandemic. However, the specific content and monetary value of this donation is unknown.   A handover ceremony was held for this donation. China’s Ambassador to Togo, Chao Weidong, the Secretary-General of the Ministry of Women's Promotion and Literacy, the Director of the National Relief Agency, and the National Leader of SOS Children's Village in Togo attended the ceremony.
